body:
<!-- Thanks for filing an issue! Before hitting the button, please answer these questions.-->

**Is this a request for help?** (If yes, you should use our troubleshooting guide and community support channels, see http://kubernetes.io/docs/troubleshooting/.):


**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** (If you have found any duplicates, you should instead reply there.):
TestMetricsDuGetCapacity
---

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one):
BUG REPORT
<!--
If this is a BUG REPORT, please:
  - Fill in as much of the template below as you can.  If you leave out
    information, we can't help you as well.

If this is a FEATURE REQUEST, please:
  - Describe *in detail* the feature/behavior/change you'd like to see.

In both cases, be ready for followup questions, and please respond in a timely
manner.  If we can't reproduce a bug or think a feature already exists, we
might close your issue.  If we're wrong, PLEASE feel free to reopen it and
explain why.
-->

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):
master branch (tip)

**Environment**:
- **Cloud provider or hardware configuration**:
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
SLES 12
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`):
Linux pts00449-vm23 3.12.28-4-default #1 SMP Thu Sep 25 17:02:34 UTC 2014 (9879bd4) ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux
- **Install tools**:
- **Others**:


**What happened**:
make test WHAT="./pkg/volume"
Running tests for APIVersion: v1,apps/v1beta1,authentication.k8s.io/v1,authentication.k8s.io/v1beta1,authorization.k8s.io/v1,authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,autoscaling/v1,autoscaling/v2alpha1,batch/v1,batch/v2alpha1,certificates.k8s.io/v1beta1,extensions/v1beta1,imagepolicy.k8s.io/v1alpha1,policy/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1beta1,rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1alpha1,settings.k8s.io/v1alpha1,storage.k8s.io/v1beta1,storage.k8s.io/v1,federation/v1beta1
+++ [0404 11:22:46] Running tests without code coverage
--- FAIL: TestMetricsDuGetCapacity (0.01s)
        metrics_du_test.go:73: Unexpected Used for directory with file.  Expected 4096, got 65536.
FAIL
FAIL    k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/volume    0.137s
Makefile:164: recipe for target 'test' failed
make: *** [test] Error 1

Test case failed
**What you expected to happen**:
Test case should pass

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):
make test WHAT="./pkg/volume"

**Anything else we need to know**:
Found this similar issue: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/20028
However the values returned are different, see this string "Expected 4096, got 65536"

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Storage.
labels.name: sig/storage

title: TestMetricsDuGetCapacity unit test fails on SLES 12 Go 1.8 ppc64le on master branch
